name: Arcane Archer
description: Arcane Archers weave magic into their arrows to produce supernatural effects.

3.name: Arcane Archer Lore
3.description: Gain proficiency in Arcana or Nature and learn the prestidigitation or druidcraft cantrip.

3.name: Arcane Shot
3.description: Learn two magical shot options to apply to arrows, usable twice per short or long rest.

3.name: Arcane Shot Options
3.description: Choose from options like Banishing Arrow, Beguiling Arrow, and more to infuse your shots with magic.

7.name: Magic Arrow
7.description: Your nonmagical arrows become magical for overcoming resistance and immunity.

7.name: Curving Shot
7.description: Use a bonus action to reroll a missed attack against a different target within 60 feet.

7.name: Additional Arcane Shot Option
7.description: Learn one additional Arcane Shot option.

10.name: Additional Arcane Shot Option
10.description: Learn one additional Arcane Shot option.

15.name: Ever-Ready Shot
15.description: If you roll initiative and have no Arcane Shot uses, regain one use.

15.name: Additional Arcane Shot Option
15.description: Learn one additional Arcane Shot option.

18.name: Additional Arcane Shot Option
18.description: Learn one additional Arcane Shot option; your options also deal extra damage.
